line_1: Her lov'd idea and their grief recals.
line_2: For lo! the sight of yonder dreary walls

line_1: "Thanks to thy friends, they cry, whose care recalls
line_2: " A prince to life, in whom a nation falls! "

line_1: And Nature's Fervor thro' their Limbs recals:
line_2: One frugal Faggot lights the naked Walls,

line_1: When stepdame Nature every bliss recals,
line_2: Fleet as the meteor o'er the desert falls;

line_1: Blows there a rose so sweet? each flower recals —
line_2: A day how gay, then droops its head and falls.
